Detailed Description

Host Driver: Implemantation of Octeon Output queues.

int octeon_init_droq ( octeon_device_t *  oct_dev,
uint32_t  q_no 
)

Allocates space for the descriptor ring for the droq and sets the base addr, num desc etc in Octeon registers.

Parameters:
oct_dev - pointer to the octeon device structure
droq_conf - pointer to the configuration values for this droq
q_no - droq no. ranges from 0 - 3.
Returns:
Success: 0 Failure: 1
